__e: Jan and I are in big shit.
"His name is Jan, ...and I don't know much about him, ...but I'll accept his right to be here because of you, Bess."
Out there, there are people who need Jan and his work.
I must go to Jan. He needs me, I can feel it.
Jan... I feel we are about to stumble onto something very important.
To Jan, I'm a heartless, rejecting bitch... and to my dog, I'm God.
Look, Jan is good for business, but he don't have the heart.
Of course, father knows that Jan is on his way back, but his arrival today will be a big surprise for him.
Mother, would it be ok if I came home for a bit while Jan's away?
Jan came to tell us something.
"Jan was very specific "that this is not going anywhere.
Jan's got a meeting across town. It should be fine.
